## ProductImage interface

Product image information. Contains the image URL and label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductImage extends MediaGalleryInterface 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [MediaGalleryInterface](./magento-api.mediagalleryinterface.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disabled?](./magento-api.productimage.disabled.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether the image is hidden from view. |
|  [label?](./magento-api.productimage.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The label of the product image or video. |
|  [position?](./magento-api.productimage.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The media item's position after it has been sorted. |
|  [url?](./magento-api.productimage.url.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The URL of the product image or video. |
